  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120440</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120440</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Mehanski ekvivalent toplote</string>
            <string language="en">Mechanical Equivalent of Heat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechanisches Äquivalent der Hitze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Équivalent mécanique de la chaleur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Equivalente mecânico do calor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Equivalente meccanico di calore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μηχανικό αντίτιμο της θερμότητας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Equivalente mecánico del calor</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Spuščanje uteži povzroča, da se v tekočini vrti lopatica, ki jo segreva.</string>
            <string language="en">The lowering of a weight causes a paddle in the water to rotate and effect is the higher temperature of a water.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">delo</string>
            <string language="en">work</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">toplota</string>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Senken eines Gewichts veranläßt ein Paddel 
im Wasser sich zu drehen und Effekt ist die höhere Temperatur eines 
Wassers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'abaissement d'un poids fait tourner une palette
dans l'eau et l'effet est la température plus élevée d'une eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abaixar de um peso faz com que uma pá na água 
gire e o efeito está a uma temperatura mais alta de uma água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'abbassamento di un peso induce una pala 
nell'acqua a ruotare e l'effetto è l'più alta temperatura di 
un'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το χαμήλωμα ενός βάρους αναγκάζει ένα κουπί στο 
ύδωρ για να περιστραφεί και να επηρεάσει είναι η υψηλότερη 
θερμοκρασία ενός ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El bajar de un peso hace una paleta en el agua 
rotar y el efecto es la temperatura más alta de un agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">travail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trabalho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εργασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">trabajo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">calor</string>
          </keyword>
